Articles.Content:
Well, the title pretty much explains it. I\'m terrible with planes. It always goes into a sort of loop I can ony get out of when I turn off the engines... At which point the plane stalls and everyone is killed.

So...

Help please?

Even though I\'m good at burning and crashing, yes this would be nice. Obviously there will be issues due to the response of the landing gear on the ground which is inevitable (although C7Studios is working on a cure as we speak) and therefore landing requires skill, an RCS module and most of all luck. The RCS module is probably the easiest/only way to fly the plane.

I\'m working on a tutorial of sorts. But I\'m working on a lot of things. It might be a while before it gets done. Flying has gotten a lot harder with some of the recent updates. So don\'t get discouraged! If you have specific questions, send me a message. But I would try downloading some of the example craft people have made. Building planes that fly well is fairly complicated.
